title: Dynamic CT angiography for cyberknife radiosurgery planning of intracranial arteriovenous malformations: a technical/feasibility report
patient: A 29 year old female investigated for headaches against a background of recent haemorrhagic stroke in a close relative, was found to have a 22 mm AVM in the pineal region (). The AVM was located in a region deemed not amenable to surgery. The patient had CKRS to a dose of 16 Gy to the 85% isodose. The nidus was obliterated 28 months following treatment.
